'''White Chestnut Oak Wood "Twilight" Floor Lamp''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for White Chestnut Oak Wood "Twilight" Floor Lamp is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] north of [[Tepeacac Rise]], after defeating {{Enemy|Forged Sand Shieldbreaker|x=1}}, {{Enemy|Forged Sand Interrogator|x=1}}, and {{Enemy|Tepetlisaurus|x=2}} southwest of the Teleport Waypoint at [[Tequemecan Valley]].
